metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13902 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.9-27 through 7.0.10-17 has a heap-based buffer over-read in BlobToStringInfo in MagickCore/string.c during TIFF image decoding.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This was caused by the following change in libtiff: https://gitlab.com/libtiff/libtiff/-/merge_requests/99 tiff packages in Ubuntu do not contain the code change, so this is not an issue.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
